name: "Sly 2" - "A Starry Eyed Encounter" (PS2) Multiple Choice Quiz  | 10 Questions

questions.text: To begin, in each level you are able to collect 30 bottles to open a secret vault.  Where is this vault located?
questions.explanation:
In the sewers.

	In order to get to the vault, you must go through the sewers to a secret room where the vault is.  The vault is in the same room as a lever you use to give Bentley and Murray access, so you can't access the vault until that mission comes.  Don't worry if you don't have all the bottles before entering.  Once you enter, the vault will be put on your camera so you can always see where it is, and you can enter the sewer for it at any time after the mission is over.

questions.text: Throughout the levels, you collect several objects and return them to the hideout for loot.  How much do you get from the ming vase?
questions.explanation:
Two hundred forty-nine coins.

	The ming vase is one of several items you can trade in for loot.  If you get it back in one piece, that is.  Some pieces are booby trapped, however.  This means you have to get them back within a certain amount of time before they explode.  Watch out for these ones; they can be the trickiest to get.

questions.text: During the party you take some recon photos.  Which of these does not appear at this party?
questions.explanation:
Dimitri.

	You have already fought and won against Dimitri, remember?  He has already been captured and put in jail.  He wasn't at the party.  Jean Bison is a later bad guy you come across in Canada.  The Contessa is a secret undercover cop who has her own prison, but you fight her in two levels later, too.  Arpeggio is the main bad guy, and you fight him in the very last level.

questions.text: How many arms are on the statue that the Clockwerk wings are attached to?
questions.explanation:
Six.

	This statue has six arms, and has had the Clockwerk wings welded on the back.  The statue has fire in each hand.  Rajan has this statue in the party room where all members of the Klaww Gang plus Neyla and Carmelita are.

questions.text: Which of the following was not a part of the tuxedo?
questions.explanation:
Neck tie.

	Remember, there is no neck tie.  It is a bowtie.  The items you collect are as follows: tuxedo jacket, gloves, shirt, dance shoes, and the bowtie.

questions.text: What room are the gloves in?
questions.explanation:
Room 102.

	Room 101 holds the bowtie.  Room 102 holds the gloves.  Room 103 holds the dance shoes.  Room 104 has the shirt, and room 105 has the tuxedo jacket.

questions.text: What color are the gems on the prize elephants?
questions.explanation:
Purple.

	These purple gems are stolen by Sly Cooper and the gang so they can make a sawblade to cut the Clockwerk wings off.  There are a total of two elephants, each with three of these gems on their heads.

questions.text: What is the code to deactivate the security door that you find under the table?
questions.explanation:
46583271.

	This number is under the last table in the room you access from the sewer, so you don't have to worry about looking under every one.  The code unlocks the security door to a room you pull the lever of so Murray and Bentley can get out.  In this room is also the vault, which you can access later if you don't have all the bottles, so don't worry about that.

questions.text: What move to you receive from the vault?
questions.explanation:
Insanity Strike.

	The paraglide hasn't been found yet, the smoke bomb makes your enemies cough so you can have a quick getaway, and the combat dodge allows you to dodge from enemies attacks.  The insanity strike confuses your enemies with a simple tap of the cane.  They are confused and begin attacking each other so you can make an escape, or get through them easier.

questions.text: How many levels of access does Bentley hack through on the computers?
questions.explanation:
Six.

	Bentley has six levels to break through, which doesn't take too long, but you must defend him as Murray while he does so.  Bentley changes from computer to computer as he hacks, so make sure you move with him when he does, or enemies will attack the unprotected turtle.
